title: ENCODE Construct
description: Schema for submitting an ENCODE transfection Construct

schema-version.description: The version of JSON schema files used in the generation of the example
schema-version.comment: Must match the specific schemas' `version` property

lab.comment: Automatic submitters can supply a Lab UUID or Name
lab.title: Lab

award.description: Award (Grant) this submission is registered under
award.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an Award UUID, name, or number
award.title: Award Name

source.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an ENCODE source UUID or unique Source name
source.title: Construct Source

url.description: External Product URL for the specific construct at vendor site
url.title: Product URL

target.description: Target that is tagged or knocked down by the construct
target.comment: Automatic submitters can supply a target uuid, or name/species pair
target.title: Construct Target

tags.description: List of tags associated with this construct
tags.title: Construct Document (list)

vector_name.description: The name of the vector used for the construct
vector_name.title: Vector Name

documents.description: List of documents associated with this construct
documents.comment: For automatic submission supply unique documents names or uuids
documents.title: Construct Document (list)

validations.description: List of documents/images associated with the validation of this construct
validations.comment: For automatic submission supply image names or uuids
validations.title: Construct Validation Images (list)

genomic_integration_site.description: Site in the biosample genome where the construct is stabily integrated
genomic_integration_site.title: Integration Site

insert_sequence.description: DNA sequence for the relevant inserted part of the construct (not including vector)
insert_sequence.title: Insert Sequence

insert_genome_coordinates.description: Coordinates in the (human or mouse) reference geneome corresponding to inserted sequence
insert_genome_coordinates.title: Insert Genome Coordintes
